childElements.name: SetValuesNegative
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "controlWidth" : 2, "label" : "Example Negative Summary", "elementValueMap" : { "ProjectStatus" : "Significant Delay", "ReasonDelay" : "There were issues with the permits due to an incorrect document. we are working on remedying this but we have to restart the procedure. Costs have increased due to our need to reshuffle resources." }, "showPersistentComponent" : [ true, false ], "show" : null, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "wpm" : false, "ssm" : false, "message" : { }, "pubsub" : false }
